title: ennaaLu thirigEdhi
sahitya:
ennALLu tirigEdi ennALLu



anupallavi



ennarAni dEhamuletti I samsAra gahanamandu pannuga jOrula rIti

parulanu vEgincacunu



caraNam 1



rEpaTi kUTiki lEdani rEyupagalu vesana mondi shrIpati pUjala

maraci cEsinaTTi vArivale ne



caraNam 2



uppu karpUramu varaku-nuncavrtticE nArjinci meppulaku

poTTinimpi-mEmE peddala manucun-



caraNam 3



bhramanu koni irugubOrugu bhakSimpa rammani

     piluva amarucuko pUja japamu-nAsAyamu cEtunanacu



caraNam 4



nayandu unDE tappulu nADE telisi konTivi gAni bAya viDuvaka

mahAnubhAva tyAgarAja vinuta
